set.from sentence: Following the base model in , we set the dimension of word embedding as 512 , dropout rate as 0.1 and the head number as 8 .

use.from sentence: We use beam search with a beam size of 4 and length penalty ? = 0.6 .

trained on.from sentence: The model is implemented in TensorFlow and trained on up to four K80 GPUs synchronously in a multi - GPU setup on a single machine .
